definition: Information about a person. E.g. as Experimenter, Author, etc.

education level.definition: Highest archived education level of the person.

full_name.definition:
The complete name of this person e.g. John
         Doe.

laterality.definition: Handedness - the dominand hand of the subject

role.definition:
The role of this person e.g. when describing
         a project (Responsible investigator), or a recording
         (Experimenter).
